trans-unit.source: Represents the drawing properties of the 3D border skin.
trans-unit.target: 表示三维边框外观的绘制属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of a skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置外观框架背景色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background gradient style of a skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的外观框架背景渐变样式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background hatch style of a skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的外观框架背景阴影样式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image of a skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置外观框架背景图像。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image alignment of a skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的外观框架背景图像对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The BackImageAlignment property is used by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode> drawing mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用 BackImageAlignment 属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>绘制模式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageAlignmentStyle"> </xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a color that is replaced with a transparent color when the background image of a border skin frame is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置绘制边框外观框架背景图像时，将替换透明颜色的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode for the background image of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置边框外观框架背景图像绘制模式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartImageWrapMode"> </xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary background color of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置边框外观框架辅助背景色。

trans-unit.source: This color is combined with the primary background color, which is set with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackColor%2A> property, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackHatchStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackGradientStyle%2A> properties are used.
trans-unit.target: 此颜色组合用主背景色设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackColor%2A>属性，当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackHatchStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackGradientStyle%2A>使用属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackGradientStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackHatchStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkin.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of a skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置外观框架边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the border line of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置边框外观框架边框线的样式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the border line of a border skin frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置边框外观框架边框线条宽度。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page color of a border skin.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置边框外观的页面颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of a border skin.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置边框外观样式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkinStyle"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.BorderSkinStyle"> </xref>枚举值。
